text:
CURRICULUM VITAE
PRASHANT MANN
Position :Civil/Structural Designer
Presently Working With : Civicon Engineers
Profession                             : Coal Washery, Crushing & Screening 
Plant 
Date of Birth :26th Nov 1992
Nationality :Indian
Father’s Name :Lt. Sh. Raj Singh
Hobbies :Playing Cricket & Football
E-mail :Prashantmaan8@gmail.com
KEY QUALIFICATIONS
Around 3 year’s experience in field of Draughtsman. Handled a wide range
of services with respect to civil infrastructure development. Experienced in
preparation of Power Plant Design Engineering drawing such as General
Arrangement,  Architectural,  Steel,  Concrete, Underground  Facilities,  etc.
Hands on experience in 2D modeling in AutoCAD.
Proficient in the use of CAD software’s like AutoCAD.
Experienced in preparation of BOQ & bar bending schedule.
EDUCATION AND PROFESSIONAL STATUS
ITI, Draughtsman Civil, Jaffarpur Kalan, New Delhi
12th from  NIOS
10th from  CBSE 
    
EMPLOYMENT RECORD
2014 – Till date Civil Designer,
Civicon Engineers, Hauz Khas, New Delhi
Responsibilities:-
Responsible  for  all  types  of  Civil/Structural  Drawings  included  General
Arrangement  &  R.C.C.  Detailed Drawings  of Plant  Building  Foundations,
Slab, Beams, Pump Foundation & Supporting Structures Foundations and
Steel Fabrication Drawings.
1Preparing Bar Bending Schedule for Civil Drawings.
Preparing Bill of Material for Civil/Structural Drawings.
Projects Handled during the tenure:-
200 TPH COKING COAL WASHARY for JINDAL STEEL & POWER Ltd.
200 TPH HM BATH COAL WASHERY for BHATIA ENERGY & MINERALS P
Ltd. 
5.0  MTPA  NLW  COAL  WASHERY,  PATHERDIH  for  BHARAT  COKING
COAL Ltd.
COMPUTER SKILLS
Proficient  in computer  applications  and  possess  a  sound  knowledge  and
practical  exposure  to  operating  systems  and  application  software  and
programming languages as under:
Windows 2000/ XP / Window-7, 8 & 10.
Microsoft Excel
AutoCAD – good at generation of specific drawings using scripts
LANGUAGE CAPABILITY
Hindi: Mother Tongue;
English: Reading - Good; Written - Good
Hindi:  Spoken  -  Excellent;  Reading  -  Excellent;  Written  –
Excellent

RZ-116, Phase-2, Prem Nagar, Najafgarh,
